imdb.plot outline: A group of 16 Jamaicans compete to win the prize of $5000.00 USD. Sixteen young adults have a life changing experience over a few weeks, one that involves them parish hopping to popular and exotic locations across Jamaica. Each new resort represents a gem in the world renown island paradise, but also a possible elimination ground for contestants on the losing teams.
imdb.title: Island Rockers
